Assistant

In this section, an assistant process can be executed in order to automatically estimate the best fitted statistical test for the data provided by the user. The decision process takes into account the following data:

  • The number of groups available (k)
  • The number of samples per group (n)
  • Pairing between groups
  • The normality of each group (tested using a Shapiro-Wilks test with alpha 0.1)
  • The homocedasticity between groups (tested using Levene test with alpha 0.1)
